name: dislin

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
DISLIN is a high level and easy to use graphics library for displaying
data as curves, bar graphs, pie charts, 3D-colour plots, surfaces,
contours and maps.

dependencies.name: motif
dependencies.description:
" Motif - Graphical user interface (GUI) specification and the widget
toolkit

dependencies.name: gl
dependencies.description: Shim package for the OSMesa OpenGL library.

dependencies.name: glx
dependencies.description: Shim package for the GLX library.

dependent_to.name: shoremap
dependent_to.description:
SHOREmap is a computational tool implementing a method that enables
simple and straightforward mapping-by-sequencing analysis. Whole genome
resequencing of pools of recombinant mutant genomes allows directly
linking phenotypic traits to causal mutations. Such an analysis, called
mapping-by-sequencing, combines classical genetic mapping and next
generation sequencing by relying on selection-induced patterns within
genome-wide allele frequency in pooled genomes.
